name: ketchersvc
description: Backend service to render molfiles to SVG using Ketcher

scripts.start: npm run build && cp src/.env dist/ && node dist/app.js
scripts.postbuild: cp -R package.json package-lock.json src/assets src/.env.example dist/
scripts.bundle: npm run lint && npm run build && docker buildx bake

author: Peter Krau√ü <peter.krauss@kit.edu>
